as.description: The element or component the current element should render as.
as.description_zh: 当前元素应呈现为的元素或组件。

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

defaultValue.description: The default value of the input.

addOnPaste.description: When true, allow adding tags on paste. Work in conjunction with delimiter prop.
addOnPaste.description_zh: 为真时，允许在粘贴时添加标记。与分隔符道具配合使用。

delimiter.description: The character to trigger the addition of a new tag. Also used to split tags for @paste event
delimiter.description_zh: 用于触发添加新标签的字符。也用于在 @paste 事件中分割标签

dir.description: The reading direction of the tabs If omitted, inherits globally from DirectionProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.
dir.description_zh: 制表符的读取方向 如果省略，则全局继承自 DirectionProvider 或假定为 LTR（从左到右）读取模式。

disabled.description: When true, the input will be disabled.

required.description: When true, the input will be required.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event handler called when the value state of the pin input changes.
events.description_zh: 当引脚输入的值状态改变时调用的事件处理程序。

events.name: invalid
events.description: Event handler called when the value is invalid
events.description_zh: 值无效时调用的事件处理程序
